content: this pattern is an additive to my snoopy pattern and is designed to fit him to find snoopy go to my designer page moon lily crochet i would specify this pattern as moderate\harder because you have to work stitches on top of the helmet to find snoopy go to https //moonlilycrochet wordpress com/2023/07/10/crochet-mini-snoopy/ materials scissors army green yarn red yarn medium brown yarn stitch marker 3 25 mm crochet hook d abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet chain = chain mc = magic_ring st = stitch some of this pattern may have mistakes please contact me on ravelry if you find one please do not copy this pattern happy crocheting
